TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 标识某个配置文件属性是否可由匿名用户设置或访问。

span.span: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确定是否可以访问的自定义配置文件实现的属性，如果用户是匿名用户。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息，请参阅配置元素提供的文档。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the configuration element. 如果没有为配置文件属性，该配置文件属性的匿名访问不允许指定。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed. 实现的自定义配置文件是继承自的类抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. 你可以在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中指定自定义用户配置文件类型`inherits`配置元素，如下面的示例中所示的属性。You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element as shown in the following example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义继承自的类创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型中指定`inherits`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素的属性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，并指定是否允许匿名访问关联的配置文件属性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于确定是否可以访问的自定义配置文件实现的属性，如果用户是匿名用户。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息，请参阅配置元素。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the configuration element. 如果没有为配置文件属性，对配置文件属性的匿名访问不允许指定。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed. 实现的自定义配置文件是继承自的类抽象类，并定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个继承自的类类创建自定义配置文件。The following example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型中指定`inherits`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素的属性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 指定实现的自定义配置文件的配置文件的示例，请参阅类概述。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the associated property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.

value.span: 如果用户能够匿名访问关联的配置文件属性，则为 ，否则为 。
